input.sentences: military members visited the partners in location location location .
they talked to low income children .
the children were so happy to see them .
they were able to provide money to give surgery to those who can not afford it .
output.sentences: A group of US Marines stopped in to visit the children at a Partners In Hope Medical Center.
These Marines were often involved in missions to stablize the area and provide aid to those in need.
The children were always happy to see them and many were on the road to recovery.
Sgt. Callihan loved to take candid pictures of the kids playing.
The Marines would always stop in and see Dr. Williams and his staff during a visit, they had a great partnership.
